faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I receive my Robux?
faq.a1: You create a Gamepass in your Roblox game with the indicated price. We purchase that Gamepass and you automatically receive the Robux in your account.
faq.a2: It's the unique number of your game on Roblox. You find it in the URL when you open your game in Roblox Creator Hub (e.g., create.roblox.com/dashboard/creations/experiences/1234567890).
faq.q3: What price should my Gamepass be?
faq.a3: The system shows you the exact price. For example, to receive 1000 Robux, your Gamepass must cost 1,429 R$ (includes Roblox's 30% tax).
faq.q4: Why do I need to disable Regional Pricing?
faq.a4: Regional Pricing changes the Gamepass price based on location. For the system to work correctly, it must be disabled.
faq.a5: After confirming the crypto payment (2-30 min depending on the currency), Robux delivery is automatic within minutes.
faq.a6: Yes. We validate your Place ID before accepting payment. If the Place ID is invalid, the payment won't be processed.
